metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36152 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in readDataVar in hdf/dataobject.c in Symonics libmysofa 0.5 - 1.1 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted SOFA.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36152` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 1.2~dfsg0-1
libmysofa1 - 1.2~dfsg0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2~dfsg0-1').
